evidence.claim: Windy City Wound Care maintains HIPAA compliance for patient data security.
The use of HL7 standards for health information exchange is highlighted on their website.
Windy City Wound Care employs FHIR for electronic health record integration.
Pain management protocols align with health IT standards including HL7 and FHIR.
